price: "Kuma ka tsakaita a tafiyarka, kuma ka runtse ga sautinka. Lalle mafi mũnin sautuka haƙĩƙa shĩ ne sautin jãkuna.* "
arabic: وَٱقۡصِدۡ فِي مَشۡيِكَ وَٱغۡضُضۡ مِن صَوۡتِكَۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلۡأَصۡوَٰتِ لَصَوۡتُ ٱلۡحَمِيرِ
footnotes: * A nan ne iyãkar wasiyyar Luƙmãn ga ɗansa. Sa'an nan kuma Allah Ya ci gaba da bayãnin yadda ake tarbiyyar mutãne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-iq'ṣid fī mashyika wa-ugh'ḍuḍ min ṣawtika inna ankara al-aṣwāti laṣawtu al-ḥamīri
